dialogue.text: Piacere, mi chiamo Alessandro Vincenzo DeLuca.
Uh... hi... I’m, um... trying to start a band...
It seems as though you’re stuck in your head.
Uh... sorry, I... Yeah,I’m struggling a little...
Challege the noise your mind produces,
When the melody of negative self-talk fills your mind,
Shift the pitch up, and layer in a positve counter example.
Reframe the negative thought in your mind and click it away.
